title: Cocaine pain
creator_credit: J Gary Mitchell Film Company and J. Gary Mitchell
brief_description: This film is a documentary that takes a startling look at coke addiction. It examines how cocaine dominates the life of the users, damages their health, impairs their mental capabilities, alienates their friends and families, and consumes millions of their dollars.
creator_credit_for_label: J Gary Mitchell Film Company and J. Gary Mitchell
